title: Metadata of the demo NFT collection for the game ZoneX.
description: Metadata of the demo NFT collection for the game ZoneX.

tech.trait.wallet.nft_token_description.nft_token_description: In the dimly lit arena of conflict, the iconic AK-47 lies ready, its steel glinting under flickering lights. A blend of durability and lethality, this weapon is revered yet feared. With a wooden stock that boasts history and an unmistakable curve of its magazine, it promises unwavering reliability amidst chaos. Its distinct crack reverberates through the air, a harbinger of intense battles to come. As soldiers advance, the rhythm of gunfire melds with adrenaline-fueled heartbeats, each shot echoing with purpose. In this unforgiving landscape, the AK-47 is not just a weapon; itâ€™s a symbol of survival and tenacity in the face of adversity.
